captions.text: Even if I take a stand
that I keep hidden in my wardrobe;
only the convenient scars are displayed,
showing me the way to countless victories with effortless strength.
No matter much I polish it, it wears me down,
my thoughts trained to unsteady ideas.
it leaves me looking at nothing but the ground;
In the time I failed to notice,
of that mirror was losing to the past, breaking.
How long do I have to scream to convey my position;
my breath gives out before I can finish,
A-Z Imagination High-of-Do YOU see it?
no matter how many times I open my eyes.
How long do I have to scream to convey my position;
my breath gives out before I can finish,
against a brazen horde of sins.
A signal, do you see it?
Conjecture; what you don't know, Is of your own volition.
A signal, do you see it?
Must be seen with your own eyes.

comments.author: Raven Flight

comments.text:
LOL, a great one. Japanese are interesting. Let's them show us moar.... 
hahaha. Philosophically speaking it's interesting.

My answer:

What you control is what you can destroy. What you destroy is what you can 
not control anymore. What you can not destroy is what you will never 
control. A thought you can erase it, a sketch you can erase it, a man you 
can kill him. An idea you can not.
That's why their are people who love killing each others. That's the only 
way to show you control humans. The more you control humans the closer you 
are to protect yourself from them.
Eventually if you erase every humans from this world you are king of every 
human being.... hahahaha.


For example When Japan tried to control China they killed many Chinese 
people without distinction, when USA decide to submit Japan they killed 
million of japanese without distinction.
In fact it doesn't matter who you kill, because killing is the only way to 
prevent yourself from being killed. So let's blood spread till the end of 
time. Because that's exactly what will happen.

The other way is to let me handle everything. I will patch you when you 
 born and decide of your future. I will be your god so you will do 
everything for me (it will become your goal) that's way I will bring peace 
among you and wealth for me.
Don't worry there is a heaven for those who protect me, even if they are 
poor (in fact it's 100% sure for poor people) :)

Oh and of course I will kill you if you are not okay with that.

In fact I'm a little sad, I'm dissapointed too. If it's really a message 
you want to pass it's not a good one. I believe your country history was 
all about living and dying by sword. A reason why you are here today is 
also because your ancestors sacrifice themselves hundreds or thousand of 
times.... Because they believed in protecting your Empire and their lords 
and their way of living. But maybe it's not a message for your people, if 
that's the case I'm okay with that.﻿
comments.author: Noway Ishould

comments.text:
I'm surprised there is no awnser, I wanted to start a little discussion 
here about the content of this song. You may have arguments. Maybe I 
misinterpret and you can say me that. (I wanted awnser to reply to)

Or maybe people think they are smart and above this? Like "Oh, I've already 
think about it and you are totally wrong" or "yah that's life you are 
right" blablabla....
In fact you can argue, say what you think about the lyrics, debate etc...
We are not superficial aren't we? Maybe you are misinterpreting what I say. 
So if you have something to ask I will gladly awnser you.

You know It's not that I'm pro-war, but you have to understand that it's 
normal for human to do it, It's normal for men to like it.

I mean since childhood we play policemen and gangster games. We love 
Chivalry etc... Maybe there is a reason.... Like being able to act in those 
situations, saving your mates, killing those who threaten you etc... It's 
situations we can all face.

And since we are citizens of modern countries I think we are not communist, 
or extremists fighting for who know what... So why blaming us for liking 
war? I mean it was always like that since the begining.... There are people 
who stole others and kill them and threat them and there are people who 
fight to protect them, there family and they are not better because 
sometimes they do really "bad" things, but can we blame them?

Those who really dislike war they are the worst killers of all human 
history.... They killed more than nazis and nationalist in fact. Because 
they wanted to bring peace everywhere they had to find a way to be 
everywhere, in every minds.... and before they knew it they were at war 
with everyone. 

It's why I like story about defending you, your friends, family, country, 
ideal and love at every cost.... What is important is to defend your own 
world, whatever it takes. And when "world collides" then.... Let's fate 
decide. Isn't it better to respect those who decide to fight and enjoy that 
than blaming them for wanting to defend what they believe in?

I respect everyone, even the worst man if he decide to protect himself and 
fight back for his own sake. There is perfection in everything even war. 
That's why men like violent stories, that's why they want to know about it 
and are fascinated by it.

Why do we like horror show?(I for myself dislike it)

That's also an interesting question.... In fact we are fascinated by that 
part of us. We all have it. We both love and despise it at the same time. 
But if we start only despise it then we are extremist, because we will have 
to "erase every sins" from our existence.
